original_title: エンプティー・ブルー
overview: After factory worker Takashi (Hata Hideaki) meets a girl in his dreams one night, he becomes obsessed with having the same dream again every night. Desperate to meet the girl again, he becomes totally preoccupied with sleep. It is while he in this state that 'incidents' start to happen on a daily basis at his factory.
title: Empty Blue
